esb-live-monitor.name: ESB LiveMon for Node VI (ex-TA)
esb-live-monitor.properties: EsbMonServer1=ems1e.a1telekom.inside:17344 EsbMonServer2=ems1e.a1telekom.inside:17344 EsbMonUser=esblivemon EsbMonUserPwd=esblivemon EsbAuditTopic=mag.vi.esb.audit EsbServer1=ems1e.a1telekom.inside:17322 EsbServer2=ems1e.a1telekom.inside:17322 EsbRequestQueue=mag.vi.esb.req Cores=vi EsbInfraInstance=main EsbInfraInstance=main EsbQueueingInstance=mk EsbAnalyticalInstance=main ProcessMonitor=enabled MonitoringNode=vi
